string.text:
A journal page, the passage reads:
"What always runs
but never walks,
often murmurs,
never talks,
has a bed but never sleeps,
has a mouth but never eats?"

A journal page, the passage reads:
"Damned if you do,
damned if you don't
jump that is"

A journal page, the passage reads:
"I am always hungry,
I must always be fed,
The finger I touch,
Will soon turn red"
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Congratulations, Stalker."

A journal page, the passage reads:
"Final resting place
for men who sought fame,
whom's blood was drained
by feelers red stained."

A journal page, the passage reads:
"Often the home
of those who ask riddles
in exchange for passage."
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Lifts you up,\n when you are down."
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Congratulations, Stalker."
